articles.author: Pip Cook
articles.title: Prince Charles steps in for Queen as he makes historic change to Great Britain - Express
articles.description: PRINCE CHARLES stepped in for Her Majesty the Queen on Tuesday as he granted Southend-on-Sea city status following the death of MP Sir David Amess.
